have private and public preview which
are different groups of users starting
to use the features you can think of
these as Alpha and beta if you want uh
then we have generally available which
means everyone can have the toggle and
uh the risk is minimal and then finally
deprecated means we decided not to go

owner uh and this was something we

just roll it out if it's a big new

efficiency improvements and refactors um
and this kind of just comes down to the
